name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Dynamic Senior FrontEnd Engineer skilled in **C#**, **.Net**, **HTML**, **CSS**, **JavaScript**, and **Python**, with extensive experience in **UI/UX**, responsive design, and adaptive design. Proven track record in utilizing **Git** for version control and ensuring cross-browser compatibility for dynamic web applications. Experienced in leveraging Azure DevOps for streamlined project management and deployment. Previously excelled as a Full-Stack Software Engineer, recognized for creating scalable, reliable, user-centric applications across various sectors including healthcare, eCommerce, and finance. Committed to driving improvements through automation and architecting robust solutions while maintaining a high standard of clean and efficient code.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed responsive and adaptive web applications utilizing **C#** and **.Net**, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and maintaining a seamless user experience.
Implemented UI/UX optimizations with a focus on HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, leading to a **30%** reduction in user task completion time.
Created dynamic user interfaces with a responsive design mindset, enhancing engagement metrics by **25%**.
Utilized **Git** for version control, achieving a collaborative workflow that maximized code quality and project efficiency.
Automated deployment processes using **Azure DevOps**, reducing deployment times by **70%**.
Conducted thorough testing and validation to ensure consistent user experience across different browsers and devices, contributing to a **40%** increase in customer satisfaction ratings.
Collaborated closely with backend teams to integrate services seamlessly, improving overall application performance by **25%**.

Utilized **C#** and **.Net** for developing high-performance front-end applications, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and responsive design.
Designed user interfaces with **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**, enhancing UI/UX and improving user engagement by 30%.
Implemented adaptive design principles, facilitating a consistent experience across devices and platforms.
Collaborated with DevOps teams using **Azure DevOps**, streamlining deployment processes and improving delivery time by 40%.
Managed source control and versioning with **Git**, maintaining project integrity and facilitating rapid development cycles.
Applied **Python** for backend integration, improving data processing efficiency by 20%.

Developed responsive web applications with **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and achieving a user satisfaction score of 95%.
Utilized **Git** for version control, facilitating collaboration with team members on projects with over 20 contributors.
Enhanced UI/UX design using adaptive design principles, leading to a 30% increase in user engagement metrics.
Implemented unit testing in **C#** and **.Net** for comprehensive testing coverage, reducing deployment issues by 25%.
Leveraged Azure DevOps to streamline CI/CD pipelines, achieving deployment times reduced to under 15 minutes per release.
